responses.rationale: The segment uses 'extremely rare' but lacks a minimiser + scale contrast pattern.
The segment describes symptoms but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment discusses PPE use and virus levels but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
Contains 'only NIH institute' but lacks an explicit denominator or quantifier like 'nationwide' in the same sentence.
The segment states 'risk... remains low' (Q5) but lacks a minimiser + scale contrast pattern.
The segment discusses past outbreaks but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment discusses price surges and stock levels but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment discusses risk for exposed individuals but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment discusses risk for exposed individuals but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment states 'does not present an immediate public health concern' (Q5) but lacks a minimiser + scale contrast pattern.
The segment discusses declines in penguin species but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment discusses economic damages but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment discusses risk of dying out but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
'The single European case' uses 'single' as a minimiser and 'European case' as the scale contrast.
The segment uses alarmist language ('unprecedented number', 'massive mortality') but lacks a minimiser + scale contrast pattern.
The segment uses vivid language ('top of the list in terms of bad guy viruses') but lacks a minimiser + scale contrast pattern.
The segment discusses testing and risk assessment but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
'infection only in one of the halls' uses 'only' as a minimiser and 'one of the halls' as the scale contrast.
The segment discusses risk of mutations but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment uses a loaded metaphor ('collateral damage') but lacks a minimiser + scale contrast pattern.
